description:
Gao is frustrated by Count Dawn`s refusal to rescue Noboru before the Omni Lords are all assembled. Meanwhile, the Fifth Omni Cavalry Dragons won`t accept Drum as their leader. Can Gao convince them to join in a final assault on Ikazuchi`s secret lair?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luminize! Super Dragon Fifth Omni Formation!!
ルミナイズ! 超竜五角陣!!
